item.title: Sociologist Note: Ideologue and Pragmatist
item.description: In solving problems, there are two approaches used, namely ideologue and pragmatist, both of these are a person’s mindset in determining the solution to the problem at hand.

item.title: Reasons why idiots isn't allowed to have democracy
item.description: Democracy is a form of government that is oriented to the voice of the people in a country, each individual is directly involved in any decision that will be taken by the country through voting.
